chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 12 has a problem. The phone (iPhone 12) no longer connects to the cellular network. Despite various attempts to restore the network and complete initialization of the cell phone, it continues not to connect. My SIM card tariff is active and I've tested it on another iPhone without any issues. Thank you for your help,

When the seller receives the package, they will have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 working days to process a refund, if applicable.
The customer has met the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ Confirmed that the product was not opened by third parties, nor damaged or exposed to liquids.
✔ Confirmed that they have removed their personal data.
✔ Confirmed that they are in possession of the return label.
✔ Agrees to include accessories and proof of purchase within the package for the return.
✔ Is aware that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once the package is delivered, the seller will have 3 days (5 days for computers and appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 days to process a refund if applicable.

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair or exchange, the 21/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 24/05/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Angela from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Dear ecomobile

Today is your last day.

Regards,
Angela from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
YR
